org.jactr.scripting.condition

Interface IConditionScript

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavascriptCondition

    public interface IConditionScript
    delegate for scripted conditions to extend, allowing the generic ScriptableCondition to handle the majority of the heavy lifting, leaving this to just evaluate the script. If the clone(IModel, VariableBindings) or bind(ScriptSupport, IModel, VariableBindings, boolean) methods throw a CannotMatchException, they should use IMatchFailures such as ScriptExecutionFailure or ExceptionMatchFailure. If the script code itself throws a CME, it can merely be passed up.
    Author:
    harrison
